name: Back Seat Driver (urist999)
description:
Back Seat Driver is a game that forces you to plan ahead. The goal of the game is to park your car in the target area. Simple right? Unfortunately, you are not in direct control of the car and must pre-record your driving input; gas, brakes, steering and guide the car to the goal.  Your input will be replayed to the car as it drives out of control.

Can be played with mouse/keyboard or gamepad.

Controls:

W/S | Top/Bottom Gamepad Face Button: Throttle/Brakes/Reverse

A/D | Left Gamepad Joystick: Steering

Spacebar | Gamepad Left Shoulder Button: Handbrake

Tab: Switch Camera Views

Made in 48hrs as an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Mesh assets from Synty Studios, Epic Games

Music from filmmusic.io:
Slow Ska Game Loop by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4375-slow-ska-game-loop
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Special thanks to @ingmarmatthis for recording video footage.

Made with Unreal Engine 4
